title: Rebuild footer to match uploaded screenshot layout (beige/black theme)

requirements.text: Rebuild the existing footer component to match the structure and spacing of the uploaded screenshot: three main columns (left: brand name + short description; middle: “Quick Links” list; right: “About” heading + short paragraph), followed by a single bottom copyright line.

quotes: 1 but keep the colour like the app is i mean the beige and black colour

acceptanceCriteria: Footer uses a 3-column layout on desktop and stacks cleanly on mobile (brand/description, quick links, about).
Middle column contains link items: Buy, Sell, Rent, Lost & Found and routes to /buy, /sell, /rent, /lost-found.
Right column shows an About paragraph (not just a single 'About Us' link) using the project name (UniXange) in the text.
Bottom area shows only: “© {currentYear} UniXange. All Rights Reserved.” centered (or visually matching the screenshot), and removes the “Built with … caffeine.ai” line.
Overall colors remain consistent with the app’s beige/black theme (no new color scheme introduced), using existing Tailwind tokens (e.g., bg-background/bg-card, text-foreground, muted-foreground).

requirements.text: Ensure the updated footer is integrated in the global layout without changing routing or authentication logic, and that the app builds successfully after the previous failed build attempt.

quotes: ❌ Sorry, app creation didn't work out
It looks like the build didn’t go through — want me to try generating it again?

acceptanceCriteria: No changes are made to backend canister code.
No changes are made to immutable hook files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Footer renders on all pages as before (via App layout), with no runtime errors or broken links.
Project compiles without TypeScript or lint errors related to the footer changes.

constraints: Do not modify files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Keep all backend logic in the single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this footer-only update.
nonGoals: Adding new pages or routes beyond using existing routes (/buy, /sell, /rent, /lost-found, /about, etc.).
Introducing new authentication, analytics, or third-party integrations.
Changing the global theme tokens in a way that alters the app’s overall beige/black visual identity.
